title: Mongolian Beef
description: Mongolian Beef is a Chinese dish that most Chinese people donâ€™t even know about.
overview: A lesser-known Chinese dish featuring tender beef in a rich, sweet, and savory sauce.

ingredients.title: Stir Fry Ingredients
content: 1 bunch spring onion (use white part for stir-fry, reserve green part for garnish)

ingredients.title: Marinade Ingredients
content: 14 oz beef, cut into 5mm thick pieces

stages.title: Step 1: Prep Ingredients
content: Slice the beef into 5mm thick pieces and mix with 2 tbsp Chinese cooking wine, 1/3 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp baking soda, and 1/2 tsp black pepper. Let sit for 30 minutes, then add 1/4 cup cornstarch to coat the beef.
Cut and separate the green and white parts of the spring onion.
Coat the beef with additional cornstarch and mix with 1.5 large egg white, massaging for another 5 minutes.

stages.title: Step 2: Make Sauce
content: Mix the sauce ingredients: 2 tsp cornstarch, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 3 tbsp brown sugar, 2/3 cup water, and 1/2 tsp ark soy sauce. Set aside.

stages.title: Step 3: Stir Fry
content: Heat 2 cups of frying oil and add the beef piece by piece; fry for 1-2 minutes per batch to prevent sticking.
In a separate pan, heat about 1.5 tbsp cooking oil, then add the minced ginger, minced garlic, and the white part of the spring onion. Stir-fry until fragrant.
Pour in the prepared sauce and stir until it thickens. Return the beef to the pan and mix thoroughly.
Garnish with the green parts of the spring onion and serve with white rice.

notes.note: Adjust cooking times as needed depending on the thickness of the beef.
